channel.title: Bragging
channel.description: Post Screenshots of end game scores that you 0wned on.

item.title: Oh Yeah!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bonecrusher)
item.dc:creator: Bonecrusher
item.content:encoded: Already letting them know whats good in the UT Pre-Alpha

item.title: TAZ a Little Rusty!
item.author: invalid@example.com (TAZTG)
item.dc:creator: TAZTG
item.content:encoded: Played a few maps today. Have to get use to all my settings, had a few lag spikes but still great fun. Fast Pace Action. Matrix is Looking for ya Jim!

item.title: Boney still got itttt
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bonecrusher)
item.dc:creator: Bonecrusher
item.content:encoded: Siiiike. Shaking off a couple years of rust is tough lol

item.author: invalid@example.com (Shattered_Steel)
item.dc:creator: Shattered_Steel
item.content:encoded:
Ok, two games. First game I'm posting cause of my kill/death ratio. TAZ did fairly good, only one on his side worth mentioning, really.

Second one we kicked tail together on Thorns. Yay us!

DAAAAAAAAMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMN!

That was a sweet game WTG BC.

item.title: EIG vs BUA 8/2/04
item.author: invalid@example.com (TAZTG)
item.dc:creator: TAZTG
item.content:encoded: Here's the scores in case you didn't know. Good Games everyone, thanks EIG for the funfest. Damn MAV kicked ass on Thorns.

item.title: So I didnt win but...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dance)
item.dc:creator: Dance
item.content:encoded:
It was essentially a 2 vs 1, look at my partners score, a whoppin 73.

only losing 10-8 aint so bad right??

item.title: FHI ownage.
item.author: invalid@example.com (-{SC}- Renamon)
item.dc:creator: -{SC}- Renamon
item.content:encoded:
I got this once score on FHI with godlike bosses that are one right after the other, I doubt I'll ever get such a good score again.

Was probably just some lucky streak or something, but for the time, it was pure ownage, for me of course.
I have managed higher scores but agansit like 60+ mobs every wave today but this is the highest so far agansit bosses.

item.title: Icey pulls a Boney
item.author: invalid@example.com (Iceburgs)
item.dc:creator: Iceburgs
item.content:encoded: Who'da thunk it could happen? Of course, it was Barn Burner. But that's a tough map to put up this kind of percentage. Mr. Happy Pants wasn't pleased that I was a point up on him.

item.title: DOH!
item.author: invalid@example.com («BuA»Meat)
item.dc:creator: «BuA»Meat
item.content:encoded:
we'll here how it goes. I don't know what's going on lately but i sure have my game to a highest level. Must admit that it's about time cause i thought i've reached my top. Hell here's a couple of 1v1 i had to prove it.

good games Steel !
